tutorial_enemy_1.name: Tiny mouse
tutorial_enemy_1.description: A tiny, round mouse the size of a palm. Its fur is white. It has a short, slightly upturned snout. Its ears are round and twitch at every sound.

town_gate_guard_out.name: Gate Guard
town_gate_guard_out.description: The guard yawns as you pass by, spear in one hand, they lean against it.

town_gate_guard_in.name: Gate Guard
town_gate_guard_in.description: The guard clutches their spear with both hands, they are jumpy and distressed.

tutorial_1.name: Shadowy Figure
tutorial_1.description: A tall, shadowy figure stands hunched, its crooked back casting an eerie silhouette. Long, spindly fingers twitch and curl, almost unnaturally long. The face is obscured, hidden beneath a cloak or veil, leaving only an unsettling sense of emptiness. Its presence feels like a looming threat, silent and foreboding.

daily_quest_board.name: Talking Quest Board
daily_quest_board.description: A large board sits firmly in the ground. On it, a dozen or so fliers are stapled to the board, a small crack in the shape of two lips appears to be slowly breathing in and out of the wood.

shroom.name: Shroom
shroom.description: An orange-capped mushroom with a bone-white stem, roughly the size of a boot. It has small eyes concealed beneath the cap. It has no arms and very short, skinny legs. Its mouth wears a perpetual grin.

rat.name: Rat
rat.description: A greasy brown rat. Its body is muscular, and it is the size of a small cat. Its ears are scarred. It scurries around quickly.

wood_stump.name: Wood Stump
wood_stump.description: A reanimated stump of a large tree. Its dirt-covered roots act like tentacles. It has one central eye. With each step, the stump creaks. It moves deliberately.

snail.name: Snail
snail.description: A slimy creature the size of a hand. It has a large, yellow-tinted shell that swirls clockwise. Its tentacle-like antennae pull back at sudden movement.

bar_drunk_0.name: Drunk
bar_drunk_0.description: One beer away from passing out.

bar_drunk_1.name: Wasted
bar_drunk_1.description: Someone take their saddle before they try to ride home!

mushroom_kingdom_chef.name: Mushrom Chef
mushroom_kingdom_chef.description: A stout mushroom with a tall, stained hat stands proudly, its cap tilted at a jaunty angle. One stubby tendril grips a hot, crackling pan that sends up wisps of fragrant steam.

mushroom_kingdom_cook.name: Mushroom Cook
mushroom_kingdom_cook.description: A nervous, speckled mushroom half the chef’s size scurries behind, juggling ingredients in its tiny hands and trying not to trip over its own cap.

mushroom_kingdom_jester.name: Mushroom Jester
mushroom_kingdom_jester.description: A lurching, multicolored mushroom cap bounds into view, its surface a chaotic swirl of reds, purples, and yellows. It is roughly the size of a large dog, though far more animated and unpredictable. Its cap droops and curls in three distinct points, resembling a jester’s hat in both shape and whimsy. Small fungal bulbs hang from each tip, pulsing faintly with bioluminescent light.

mushroom_kingdom_citizen.name: Mushroom Citizen
mushroom_kingdom_citizen.description: A short, round mushroom with a beige cap and sleepy eyes waddles along quietly, leaving tiny spore prints in its wake.

orange_mushroom.name: Orange Mushroom
orange_mushroom.description: A large, orange-capped mushroom, the size of a big dog. Its stem is the color of an eggshell. It has no arms or legs—its eyes glare at you while its mouth curves into a wide, uncomfortable smile. It hops when it moves, its body making a loud thud with each short jump.

green_slime.name: Green Slime
green_slime.description: A mass of green ooze. It is sticky yet bouncy, moving with no purpose.

spider.name: Spider
spider.description: A many-legged chitinous predator. It has several beady eyes that focus on you relentlessly. It scuttles with unnerving precision.

wandering_rock.name: Wandering Rock
wandering_rock.description: An ordinary boulder, covered in moss on one side, with the other side freshly scraped. The rock has been dragging itself forward.

fairy_drunk.name: Drunk fairy
fairy_drunk.description: A tiny humanoid creature, glowing with blue and gold light, sways erratically in the air. Its soft wings flutter rapidly, struggling to keep it aloft as it drifts from side to side. The creature’s movements are jerky and uncoordinated, as if it can barely control its own flight, and its glowing eyes have a dazed, unfocused look.

bartender.name: Bartender
bartender.description: The bartender cleans a mug with steady, practiced hands, the cloth moving in slow, deliberate circles. Each motion is smooth and efficient, as if the task is second nature. The mug is turned and tilted with care, the rag gliding over its surface as the bartender’s gaze shifts between the task and the room.

red_slime.name: Red Slime
red_slime.description: A mass of red ooze, sticky yet bouncy, moves with no purpose, leaving a faint, ominous trail as it shifts aimlessly.

red_cap.name: Red Cap
red_cap.description: The mushroom is 4 feet tall, it has a large red cap. It can move by hopping around, making a thud with each jump.

blue_slime.name: Blue Slime
blue_slime.description: A mass of blue ooze, sticky yet bouncy, moves aimlessly with a strange, unsettling fluidity.

blue_mushroom.name: Blue Mushroom
blue_mushroom.description: The mushroom is 4 feet tall, it has a large blue cap. It can move by hopping around, making a thud with each jump.

octopus.name: Octopus
octopus.description: A floating mass of purple flesh hovers three feet above the ground. It has several tentacles that move sluggishly, their number unevenly spaced around its entire body.

ant_larva.name: Ant Larva
ant_larva.description: A baby sized clear skinned larva.

wood_stump_large.name: Large Wood Stump
wood_stump_large.description: A massive reanimated stump of a once-great tree, its gnarled, dirt-covered roots twisting and thrashing like monstrous tentacles. At the center of its jagged, bark-covered body sits a single, menacing eye, glowing with a fierce, malevolent light. With each deliberate step, the stump groans and creaks, sending splinters of wood into the air. It moves with a terrifying purpose, its roots slamming the ground as it advances, ready to crush anything in its path.

evil_eye.name: Evil Eye
evil_eye.description: A yellow worm the size of a child. It has two arms on each side. It drags itself forward, leaving a trail with its heavy tail. It has one central eye. Its mouth has several rows of square, yellowish teeth.

thief.name: Thief
thief.description: A tall cloaked figure in a battle-ready stance. Their cloak is long and dirty. They have a dagger clenched in their fist.

horned_mushroom.name: Horned Mushroom
horned_mushroom.description: The mushroom is 4 feet tall, it has a large cyan cap, which is covered in thorns. It can move by hopping around, making a thud with each jump.

skeleton_1.name: Skeleton
skeleton_1.description: A tall skeletal humanoid, its eye sockets empty and lifeless, its jaw loose and hanging from its skull. Each step it takes makes a loud crackling sound.

skeleton_mage.name: Skeletal Sourcerer
skeleton_mage.description: A tall skeletal humanoid wearing a thin, loosely fit robe. Its eye sockets are empty and lifeless, its jaw loose and hanging from its skull. Each step it takes makes a loud crackling sound.

ant_alchemist.name: Ant Alchemist
ant_alchemist.description: A slender humanoid with four long arms, the muscular body is covered by chitin, and the eyes are black and lidless.

boss_rat.name: Rat King
boss_rat.description: A grotesque mass of rats tangled together, their bodies fused in a twisted, writhing knot. The rats vary in size, some large and muscular, others smaller and more wiry. Their fur is greasy and matted, clumped together in patches.

mushroom_soldier.name: Mushroom Soldier
mushroom_soldier.description: The mushroom is 4 feet tall, it has a large red cap. It can move by hopping around, making a thud with each jump. It has no arms yet stands ready with a spear by its side.

mushroom_thief.name: Mushroom Thief
mushroom_thief.description: The mushroom is 4 feet tall, it has a large red cap. It can move by hopping around, making a thud with each jump. It has no arms yet you see a knife at the ready.

mushroom_mage.name: Mushroom Mage
mushroom_mage.description: The mushroom is 4 feet tall, it has a large blue cap. It can move by hopping around, making a thud with each jump. It murmurs and chants, mycelium covers the lower part of its face, resembling a long white beard.

mushroom_cleric.name: Mushroom Cleric
mushroom_cleric.description: The mushroom is 4 feet tall, it has a large yellow cap. It can move by hopping around, making a thud with each jump.

mushroom_zombie.name: Mushroom zombie
mushroom_zombie.description: The mushroom is 4 feet tall, it has a large purple cap. It can move by hopping around, making a thud with each jump. Its eyes are lifeless, and the stem partly rotted.

zombie.name: Zombie
zombie.description: A tall humanoid with purple skin, mottled and uneven in tone. Its body is gaunt, with skin stretched tight over protruding bones. Its movements are slow and jerky, accompanied by low, guttural groans.

crocodile.name: Crocodile
crocodile.description: A lizard the size of a large dog, its teeth sharp and long like knives. Its scales are rough, shifting in shades of green and brown. Its eyes gleam with a predatory gaze, and its tail flicks menacingly as it moves with a swift, unsettling grace.

skeleton_soldier.name: Skeleton Soldier
skeleton_soldier.description: A tall skeletal humanoid in rusty chainmail armor. It drags its broken sword behind it as it moves deliberately.

fairy.name: Fairy
fairy.description: A tiny humanoid creature, glowing with blue and gold light. Its soft wings flutter rapidly, barely making a sound as it hovers in place. The creature’s delicate features are faintly illuminated by its own ethereal glow.

mushroom_kingdom_king.name: Mushrom King
mushroom_kingdom_king.description: A plump mushroom draped in a lopsided mossy robe shifts uneasily beneath a crooked crown made of twigs and golden spores. Their wide eyes dart nervously as they fidgets with a scepter that's clearly too heavy for them.

mushroom_kingdom_entrance_guard.name: Mushrom Guard
mushroom_kingdom_entrance_guard.description: A large red-capped mushroom. The guard is tall and slender.  It hops as it moves. A spear is by its side, ready to jab at any threats.

mushroom_kingdom_guard.name: Mushrom Guard
mushroom_kingdom_guard.description: A large red-capped mushroom. The guard is tall and slender.  It hops as it moves. A spear is by its side, ready to jab at any threats.

mushroom_kingdom_queen.name: Mushroom Queen
mushroom_kingdom_queen.description: Tall and regal, the mushroom’s smooth cap glistens with dew, a gill-fringed cloak trailing gracefully behind. They watch with calm authority, gaze steady and unreadable beneath a crown of woven roots and blooming fungi.

mushroom_kingdom_wizard.name: Mushroom Wizard
mushroom_kingdom_wizard.description: A large red-capped mushroom. The guard is tall and slender.  It hops as it moves. The cap flares out in a way that resembles a wizard’s hat, giving it a mystical appearance. It has no arms or legs, yet it holds a staff in one spore-covered hand. Its eyes glare at you while its mouth curves into a wide, uncomfortable smile. It hops around when it moves, its body making a loud thud with each short jump.

ant_nurse.name: Ant Nurse
ant_nurse.description: A slender humanoid with four long arms, the muscular body is covered by chitin, and the eyes are black and lidless.

ant_scout.name: Ant Scout
ant_scout.description: A slender humanoid with four long arms, the muscular body is covered by chitin, and the eyes are black and lidless.

ant_soldier.name: Ant Soldier
ant_soldier.description: A slender humanoid with four long arms, the muscular body is covered by chitin, and the eyes are black and lidless.

ant_queen.name: Ant Queen
ant_queen.description: A slender humanoid with four long arms, the muscular body is covered by chitin, and the eyes are black and lidless.

bee_worker.name: Bee Worker
bee_worker.description: A yellow and black stiped bee the size of a foot ball. How are they flying with such tiny wings!

bee_soldier.name: Bee Soldier
bee_soldier.description: A black and yellow stiped bee the size of a microwave.

bee_queen.name: Bee Queen
bee_queen.description: A huge bee the size of a door! this one dose not have any stripes on it.

mushroom_kingdom_necromancer.name: Mushroom Necromancer
mushroom_kingdom_necromancer.description: A huge mushroom with a blue cap and gray spots stands in the shadows. Its white stem sways as it gives off clouds of spores. One thick, spongy arm holds a staff made of old bone, covered in strange glowing symbols. Two green eyes glow from under its cap, and its wide, unnatural smile never fades. It moves by hopping, each jump landing with a heavy thud, while dark mist curls around the ground and the dead begin to stir.

mushroom_zombie_behemoth.name: Mushroom Zombie Behemoth
mushroom_zombie_behemoth.description: A towering, zombie-like mushroom looms with a rotting brown cap mottled in grayish spots, its eggshell-colored stem marred by patches of decay. Vacant, soulless eyes glare from beneath its ragged, weathered cap as it lurches forward in heavy, thudding hops. Despite having no limbs, its presence is monstrous and unnervingly animate.

npc_zone_1.name: Lumberjack
npc_zone_1.description: They rest by a wooden stump, a rusty handaxe by their side.

npc_zone_2.name: Slime Scientist
npc_zone_2.description: A curious figure is poking at a dead slime with a stick.

npc_zone_3.name: Gardener
npc_zone_3.description: The gardener is leaning against the walls of a small shed.

gambling_0.name: Gambler
gambling_0.description: A tiny figure with a bunch of dice squats on the ground.

swing.name: Swing
swing.description:
Deal physical damage based on
Highest stat between Grit and Flow.

guard.name: Guard
guard.description:
Raise your guard.
Become immune to physical and magical damage for DURATION of turns.
If your guard is not disturbed during this duration.
Recover BONUS of Hold and Ward.

bash.name: Bash
bash.description:
Deal physical damage based on your Grit.
.Applies Stunned for DURATION of turns.

smite.name: Smite
smite.description: Deal pure damage based on your Soul.

magic_missile.name: Magic Missile
magic_missile.description: Deal magical damage based on your Mind.

stab.name: Stab
stab.description: Deal physical damage based on your Flow.Applies Bleeding for DURATION of turns.

slash.name: Slash
slash.description: Deal physical damage based on your Grit.

cleave.name: Cleave
cleave.description:
Deal physical damage based on your Grit.
Does not end your turn if target dies.

double_whack.name: Double Whack
double_whack.description:
Deal physical damage based on your Flow.
Then do it again.

ethereal.name: Become Ethereal
ethereal.description:
Become ethereal for DURATION of turns.
Cannot receive or deal physical damage.
.Received magical damage is amplified by BONUS.

cure_light_wounds.name: Cure Light Wounds
cure_light_wounds.description: Recover targets Life based on your Soul.

leech.name: Leech
leech.description: Convert BONUS of physical damage dealt to Life for yourself.

thorns.name: Thorns
thorns.description: Reflect BONUS of physical damage received back to attacker.

bless.name: Bless
bless.description: Boost Grit, Flow, Mind and Soul by BONUS

stealth.name: Stealth
stealth.description:
Applies Stealth for DURATION of turns.
Double your Flow for DURATION of turns.
Using Stab will deal BONUS extra damage.
Receiving any damage will instantly dispel Stealth.

refresh.name: Refresh
refresh.description: Recover the Life of party members based on your Soul.

chain_heal.name: Chain Heal
chain_heal.description: Deal magical damage based on your Mind.

disorient.name: Disorient
disorient.description: Remove all Hold and Ward from your target for DURATION of turns.

nudge.name: Nudge
nudge.description:
Deal physical damage based on
Highest stat between Grit and Flow.

bite.name: Bite
bite.description:
Deal physical damage based on
Highest stat between Grit and Flow.

deflect_magic.name: Deflect Magic
deflect_magic.description: For DURATION of turns, all magic damage is deflected onto the original caster as Pure damage.

nightmare.name: Nightmare
nightmare.description:
Applies Nightmare for DURATION of turns.
Nightmare cannot be resisted.
Nightmare ends the moment target receives any damage.
Ending the Nightmare starts the victims turn instantly.

chain_lightning.name: Chain Lightning
chain_lightning.description: Recover the Life of party members based on your Soul.

mend_armor.name: Mend Armor
mend_armor.description: Recover the targets Hold and Ward by MIND + SOUL + DAMAGE.

promise.name: Promise
promise.description:
Applies Promised for DURATION of turns.
All damage is paused until Promised ends.
All damage received from Promised is received as pure damage.

brain_sap.name: Brain Sap
brain_sap.description: Deal magical damage based on your Mind.

dispel.name: Dispel
dispel.description:
Dispel your target, removing a random buff if its an enemy, or a random debuff if its an ally.
Dispelling an affliction will cause it to activate its last turn action if applicable.
Does nothing if there are no dispellable afflictions.
Successfully dispelling an enemy deals your Mind in magic damage.
Succesfully dispelling an ally will heal them for your Soul.

fireball.name: Fireball
fireball.description:
Deal magical damage based on your Mind.
If you take damage while casting Fireball
You will cast Fireball on yourself instead.

flat_heal_hp.name: Heal Life
flat_heal_hp.description: Instantly recover x% of your Life, Hold and Ward.

flat_heal_pa.name: Heal Hold
flat_heal_pa.description: Instantly recover x% of your Life, Hold and Ward.

flat_heal_ma.name: Heal Ward
flat_heal_ma.description: Instantly recover x% of your Life, Hold and Ward.

potion_remove_armor.name: Red Potion
potion_remove_armor.ambience: The potion emits a soft glow

potion_hp_30.name: Green Potion
potion_hp_30.ambience: The potion emits a soft glow

translucent scroll.name: Translucent Scroll
translucent scroll.description: Its so hard to read this…

practice_cookie.name: Cookie
practice_cookie.description: Eat this to get one practice point!

potion_renew_hp_30.name: Green Pheromone
potion_renew_hp_30.description: Its a vial of bronze-red... stuff

tavern_food_item_dinner_0.name: Light Dinner
tavern_food_item_dinner_0.description: A simple dinner for a simple kind of man.

tavern_food_item_dinner_1.name: Medium Dinner
tavern_food_item_dinner_1.description: A dinner full of meat and greens.

tavern_food_item_mug_of_ale.name: Mug of Ale
tavern_food_item_mug_of_ale.description_room: A mug of ale is here
tavern_food_item_mug_of_ale.description: A mug of ale, there is foam at the rim.

axe.name: Axe
axe.description: A heavy axe, ideal for chopping wood or foes

beer_stein.name: Beer stein
beer_stein.description: A thick mug with a lid

black raincoat.name: Black raincoat
black raincoat.description: A waterproof coat for braving harsh weather conditions

bronze chainmail.name: Bronze chainmail
bronze chainmail.description: A robust chainmail offering solid defense against attacks.

bronze koif.name: Bronze koif
bronze koif.description: A durable koif that offers basic protection for the head

brown wizard hat.name: Brown pointy hat
brown wizard hat.description: A pointy hat favored by novice spellcasters

brown wizard robe.name: Brown robe
brown wizard robe.description: A flowing robe, perfect for those seeking to channel magical energy.

curved stick.name: Curved stick
curved stick.description: A simple stick with a curved end, useful for training or basic combat

event_1.name: Old coin
event_1.description: Holding this tarnished coin fills you with an unsettling sense of both luck and dread.#END#«And he who sailed never reached the harbor, for the harbor was yet to come in a future patch.»#END#    - kuro february 3rd 2025

field dagger.name: Field dagger
field dagger.description: A lightweight dagger, perfect for quick, precise strikes

flow body 1.name: Ragged tunic
flow body 1.description: A once fine common shirt, probably endured a dozen different owners.

flow head 1.name: Ragged hood
flow head 1.description: A ragged hood, its so beat up it looks like a mesh

flow head c1.name: Shroom cap hood
flow head c1.description: A big shroom cap with its core scraped out to fit your head.

flow relic 1.name: Apprentice rogue emblem
flow relic 1.description: You have proved your worth, and are now an apprentice rogue

flow trinket c1.name: Rat tail necklace
flow trinket c1.description: A smooth necklace made with rat tails.

flow weapon c1.name: Rat tooth shiv
flow weapon c1.description: A simple shiv made with rat teeth.

grit body 1.name: Leather vest
grit body 1.description: A tunic made of cow hide, you count six spots!

grit body c1.name: Wood armor
grit body c1.description: A wooden board straped to your chest, not so confortable.

grit head 1.name: Leather hat
grit head 1.description: A hat made of cow hide.. moo!

grit head c1.name: Wood helm
grit head c1.description: A wooden bowl used like a helmet. Better than nothing.

grit relic 1.name: Apprentice fighter emblem
grit relic 1.description: You have proved your worth, and are now an apprentice fighter

grit trinket c1.name: Rat slayer ornament
grit trinket c1.description: A wooden sword decorated with the teeth of your fallen rat enemies.

grit weapon c1.name: Wood sword
grit weapon c1.description: A simple wooden sword. cearfull you might get a splinter.

mind body 1.name: Coat
mind body 1.description: A long thin dark gray coat.

mind head 1.name: Pointy hat
mind head 1.description: A oversized pointed hat, a little crooked at the tip

mind relic 1.name: Apprentice mage emblem
mind relic 1.description: You have proved your worth, and are now an apprentice mage

mind trinket 1.name: Piece of paper
mind trinket 1.description: Now you can write down your spells

mind weapon 1.name: Stick
mind weapon 1.description: Nothing more magical than finding a cool stick

mind weapon c1.name: Shroom caped stick
mind weapon c1.description: Just a shroom cap on a stick.

mind weapon c1_2.name: Shroom caped stick
mind weapon c1_2.description: Just a shroom cap on a stick.

notebook.name: Notebook
notebook.description: A bound notebook for jotting down spells or thoughts

plague doctor mask.name: Plague doctor mask
plague doctor mask.description: A mysterious mask with eerie overtones, often worn by healers

prayer beads.name: Prayer beads
prayer beads.description: A string of beads for meditation and spiritual focus

red cap.name: Red cap
red cap.description: A stylish red cap that adds a dash of flair to your attire

red scarf.name: Red scarf
red scarf.description: A scarf made of red silk

red t-shirt.name: Red t-shirt
red t-shirt.description: A casual t-shirt, more for fashion than function

single earing.name: Single earing
single earing.description: A single earing, kinda quirky to only wear one

soul body 1.name: Brown monk robe
soul body 1.description: A brown robe with a hint of orange.

soul body c1.name: White rat fur robe
soul body c1.description: A robe made with white fluffy fur

soul head c1.name: White rat fur hat
soul head c1.description: A cap made with white fluffy fur

soul relic 1.name: Apprentice cleric emblem
soul relic 1.description: You have proved your worth, and are now an apprentice cleric

soul trinket c1.name: Prayer beads necklace
soul trinket c1.description: A long string with Wooden beads ornamenting it.

soul trinket c1_2.name: Prayer beads necklace
soul trinket c1_2.description: A long string with Wooden beads ornamenting it.

soul trinket c1_3.name: Prayer beads necklace
soul trinket c1_3.description: A long string with Wooden beads ornamenting it.

soul weapon 1.name: Prayer beads
soul weapon 1.description: Wooden beads on a thin thread

soul weapon c1.name: Prayer beads
soul weapon c1.description: Wooden beads on a thin thread

soul weapon c1_2.name: Prayer beads
soul weapon c1_2.description: Wooden beads on a thin thread

wooden mallet.name: Wooden mallet
wooden mallet.description: A hamer with a quiet large wooden head

bag_0.name: Rat Pouch
bag_0.description: This abomination of stitched rat fur creates a small pouch, you can even tie the tail to your belt for easy carrying.

ellinia_shop_weapon_quest_1.name: Branchy wand
ellinia_shop_weapon_quest_1.description: Made from several tree branches fused together, its perfect for a beginner mage.

flow body c3.name: Spider bracers
flow body c3.description: The carapace of spider legs used as arm protection.

flow head 3.name: Cloth hood
flow head 3.description: A cloth hood dyed a dark gray color

flow head c3.name: Spider googles
flow head c3.description: The eye lenses of a spider. Not sure if you see more or less.

flow trinket 3.name: Dagger
flow trinket 3.description: A small knife perfect for offhand

flow trinket c3.name: Spider dagger
flow trinket c3.description: A large spiders fang, wrapped in a leather strap

flow weapon c3.name: Spider short sword
flow weapon c3.description: A wooden plank, the edges are decorated with several rows of spider fangs

flow weapon c3_1.name: rat tooth knuckles
flow weapon c3_1.description: A pair of fingerless, orange gloves. Fitted with rat teeth for knuckles

grit body 3.name: Hard leather vest
grit body 3.description: A thick tunic with fastened straps.

grit body c3.name: Leather vest
grit body c3.description: A leather vest made from cured pig hide.

grit head 3.name: Hard leather helmet
grit head 3.description: The leather covers the face, kinky

grit head c3.name: Leather helm
grit head c3.description: A leather helm made from cured pig hide.

grit trinket c3.name: Pig slayer pin
grit trinket c3.description: A decorative pin, it depicts a rat atop an orange mushroom.

grit trinket c3_1.name: Stone shield
grit trinket c3_1.description: A flat rock with leather straps

grit weapon 3.name: Spear
grit weapon 3.description: A long stick with a triangular steel tip

grit weapon c3.name: Stone club
grit weapon c3.description: A big rock on a stick.

grit weapon c3_1.name: Stone spear
grit weapon c3_1.description: A pointy rock on a long stick

grit weapon c3_2.name: Stone sword
grit weapon c3_2.description: A long rock on a stick

mind body c3.name: Green slime coat
mind body c3.description: A green coat made of green jell. Not as sticky as it looks.

mind head 3.name: Fine pointy hat
mind head 3.description: A light blue tinted pointed hat

mind head c3.name: Green slime antenna
mind head c3.description: A green slime antena. Could it be a reference?

mind trinket 3.name: Notebook
mind trinket 3.description: Now you can write down lots of spells

mind trinket c3.name: Green slime gloves
mind trinket c3.description: A pair of green gloves made of green jell. Not as sticky as it looks.

mind weapon 3.name: Simple wand
mind weapon 3.description: A piece of driftwood that has been cleaned and carved into a wand.

mind weapon c3.name: Green slime sphere
mind weapon c3.description: A green sphere of slime with a rock in the center.

mind weapon c3_2.name: Blue capped simple wand
mind weapon c3_2.description: A blue musroom cap on a simple wand. Good job.

soul body 3.name: Fine silk robe
soul body 3.description: A robe made of the finest silk

soul body c3.name: Orange mushroom robe
soul body c3.description: A orange vest made from crudely stitching some mushroom caps together.

soul head 3.name: Fine silk hat
soul head 3.description: A hood made of the finest silk

tutorial_paper_1.name: A piece of paper

tutorial_paper_1.description: This little note reads"not all exits are obvious, some are hidden, go east to proceed"

tutorial_paper_2.name: Another piece of paper
tutorial_paper_2.ambience: A piece of paper rustles along the ground
tutorial_paper_2.description: This little note reads“You probably already figured it out, but loot dropped from enemies goesdirectly into your inventory, you also got a weapon!Identify it and equip it with “equip [item name]” then proceed north"

tutorial_quest_item_1.name: Mouse corpse
tutorial_quest_item_1.description: I wonder what they need a mouse for.

key_tavern_cellar.description: A stickey slightly rusted key, it smells like ale.

mug.name: Mug

scenery_tavern_keg.ambience: A drop of ale trickles from the tap of the keg.
scenery_tavern_keg.description: A keg of ale, there is a label on the side, "carlsberg"

scenery_campfire.name: Campfire
scenery_campfire.ambience: @redThe fire crackles gently, its warm light dancing across nearby surfaces and casting soft, shifting shadows. The steady glow brings a sense of calm and comfort, pushing back the surrounding darkness.@back

scenery_fireplace.name: Fireplace
scenery_fireplace.ambience: @redThe fire crackles gently, its warm light dancing across nearby surfaces and casting soft, shifting shadows. The steady glow brings a sense of calm and comfort, pushing back the surrounding darkness.@back

scenery_leaky_ceiling.name: Leaky ceiling
scenery_leaky_ceiling.ambience: @cyanWater trickles slowly along a crack in the ceiling before slipping loose and falling. making soft plinks as it hits the ground.@back
scenery_leaky_ceiling.description: As you look up water drips on your face

scenery_tavern_table_carving.name: Carving in the table

scenery_tavern_table_carving.description: The carving is spelling "uck MSSP", whatever that means

zombie_skin.description: This is just disgusting to hold

armor_lose.name: Thin

marmor_gain.name: Warded
marmor_gain.description: Gain 2 magical armor per item level

marmor_lose.name: Exposed
marmor_lose.description: Lose 2 magical armor per item level

dmg_phy_bonus.description: You deal 10% more physical damage, but 10% less healing and other damage types

dmg_mag_bonus.description: You deal 10% more magical damage, but 10% less healing and other damage types

dmg_pure_bonus.description: You deal 10% more pure damage, but 10% less healing and other damage types

dmg_heal_bonus.name: Healthy

phy_to_mag.name: Ethereal

mag_to_phy.name: Tangible
mag_to_phy.description: Convert all magical damage to physical damage
